dialogue.line: Woah, calm down Francine. It's only me.
Don't come any closer! You have strayed from God's path, and must atone for your sins.
I'm just looking for my son, can you help me find him?
Listen to the Lord, your God, for He is speaking to you.
Travel to the church in Deadlock Woods and confess your sins to Him.
May he guide you to the light...
